Notes_explanation: Name of the protein with lineage, species, accession info e.g., Bacteria>Actinobacteria M. tuberculosis A0A0E7X019 would translate to 'BActino_Mtuberculosis_A0A0E7X019'
UniProt accession number from InterPro Pfam database
Corresponding NCBI accession number
Species name (from NCBI; using MolEvolvR)
Taxonomic identifier (NCBI; using MolEvolvR)
Lineage generated from NCBI TaxDump (using MolEvolvR); Kingdom, Phylum
Domain architecture created using Pfam profile searches (using MolEvolvR)
Domain architecture created using Pfam profile searches (using MolEvolvR)
Starting position of DciA domain (from Pfam profile match)
End (stopping) position of DciA domain (from Pfam profile match)
Length of protein
Starting position of IDR (from MobiDBLite prediction)
End (stopping) position of IDR (from MobiDBLite prediction)
Number of amino acid residues from the start of the protein to the start of the DciA domain
Number of amino acid residues from the end of the protein to the end of the DciA domain
Group nomenclature based on N-/C-terminal extension lengths and the relative position of the DciA domain

Domain architecture created using SMART profile searches (using MolEvolvR)

Domain architecture created using Gene3D (CATH) profile searches (using MolEvolvR)

Domain architecture created using TIGRFAM profile searches (using MolEvolvR)
Lineage generated from NCBI TaxDump (using MolEvolvR); Kingdom, Phylum, Class
